scripts.codegen:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.codegen:rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run codegen:mainnet && graph build subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:rinkeby: npm run codegen:rinkeby && graph build subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:mainnet: npm run build:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service omnuum/omnuum-mainnet subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:rinkeby: npm run build:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service omnuum/omnuum-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:ddevkim:rinkeby: npm run build:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service ddevkim/omnuum-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
